description: A vulnerability in the HPE Aruba Networking Virtual Intranet Access (VIA) client could allow local users to elevate privileges. Successful exploitation could allow execution of arbitrary code with NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM privileges on the operating system.

product.name: HPE Aruba Networking Virtual Intranet Access (VIA)

enisaIdProduct.product_version: HPE Aruba Networking Virtual Intranet Access (VIA) client for Microsoft Windows ≤≤4.5.0
